Description:
Site Engineer ( Potable Water, Carbon Steel )Supervising Excavation laying of Carbon Steel Pipeline works for Potable Water
Supervising Hydro Pressure test, Disinfection and flushing works, and Fitting installation of chambers for Water works.
Review the material and method statements submittals as per contract specifications.
Prepare daily logs and reports.
Maintain records of inspections made, tests performed, work executed, etc.
Provide general inspection on all construction labor and subcontracted tasks to ensure professional workmanship.
Monitor the overall work progress along with the monthly schedule plan and baseline.
Prepare reports of non-conforming works, site instructions, corrective actions, and coordinating responses.Skills
Skills:
Has min 3 years of Experience with Carbon Steel Pipes
has BSc. in Civil Engineering
